description: Operating System Metrics and Apache Cassandra Node Information

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Percentage of memory used (ignoring page cache)

targets.expr: 100 * ((sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="free"}) + sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="cached"}) + sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="buffered"})) / sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host"}))

panels.title: Memory Used

panels.description: Percentage of root disk in use
panels.title: Disk Used

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (1 min average)
panels.title: CPU System Load (1m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: CPU System Load (5m avg)

targets.expr: sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host"}) - sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="free"}) - sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="cached"}) - sum(collectd_memory{instance="$host", memory="buffered"})

panels.description: The amount of requests pending in the disk queue
panels.title: Disk Queue Length

targets.expr: sum(rate(collectd_cpu_total{instance="$host", type=~"(interrupt|nice|steal)"}[$rate])) by (cpu, type)  / ignoring(type) group_left sum(rate(collectd_cpu_total{instance="$host" }[$rate])) by (cpu) * 100

panels.description: Number of sstables on the node
panels.title: SSTable Count

panels.description: Number of pending compactions on the node
panels.title: Pending Compactions

panels.description: Number of client connections to the node
panels.title: Connected Clients

title: System & Node Metrics
